content: If you think Barca really has a chance to make this comeback you are going to be very disappointed. First, Juventus has the best and most organized defense in the Champions League. Out of 9 games played this Champions League season Juve has conceded 2 goals! Barca will give up at least one goal since their defence is very suspect which means they will need 5 goals and I can’t see that happening unless Juve somehow ends up with only 9 men on the field.
